summary:
Elena: Do you want to tell me how you two crashed the car?
Eve: Well, we were driving and there was this deer in the middle of...
body:
Elena: Do you want to tell me how you two crashed the car?


Eve: Well, we were driving and there was this deer in the middle of the road that Villanelle couldn’t see, so I shouted, “Villanelle, deer!”


Elena:


Villanelle:


Eve: Would you like to tell her what your response was?


Villanelle: … “yes, my love?”

summary: Killing Eve and Villanelle
title: Killing Eve and Villanelle
body:
I am not going to lie, I had no idea of the existence of Killing Eve until the past Golden Globes awards. And I did not really care much about it until I saw some youtuber making a comment about lesbian relationship or sexual tension between the character. So yeah that was my only motivation.

After binge watching it I discovered so much more. 

After the first episode I was totally intrigued and hooked. 


The plot is kind of typical, brilliant but odd psychopath killer chased by a brilliant and odd agent. There aren’t a lot of surprises if you are a cinephile or have watched lots of series, SPOILER ALERT! the ones that look shady they are…

But the show has style, the cinematography and the design are on point, the two main characters are awkward gems and the humour is brilliantly dark! (Later I discover that the person behind the show is Phoebe Waller-Bridge who created Fleabag a weird dark humour and scatological comedy, some kind of British version of Frances Ha without filters and angrier).

Sandra Oh got a Golden Globe but the star of the show is Jodie Comer. Cute, sweet, sexy and terribly crazy! I fell in love with her…

Now waiting for the season 2. 

The only good thing of finding this show that late is that I don’t have to wait that much for their next season.

summary: I kid u not, I cried. I fucking cried. I usually never cry when it comes to books, but I highly recommend it. This fic has 13706...
body:
It is 3:12am and I just finished the most amazing Killing Eve fic.

Show Chapter | Archive of Our Own

I kid u not, I cried. I fucking cried. I usually never cry when it comes to books, but I highly recommend it. This fic has 13706 hits as of now and All i can say is…ITS A GREAT STORY.

31 chapters of beautiful, well paced, explicit-for a reason;) - plot. So if you are a fan of Killing Eve, please read it 🙏🏻

summary: “So you trash my apartment because you like me so much?”  AND THEN THEY LAUGH AND SPEND THE NEXT TWO HOURS CLEANING THE...
body:
“So you trash my apartment because you like me so much?”

AND THEN THEY LAUGH AND SPEND THE NEXT TWO HOURS CLEANING THE APARTMENT BEFORE THEY WATCH A MOVIE TOGETHER.

That’s how I pretend the season ends from here on out.

summary: did...did they really make it so Oksana is born one day after Jodie Comer? really? they did that? that’s... somehow even more...
body:
did…did they really make it so Oksana is born one day after Jodie Comer?

really? they did that?

that’s… somehow even more weird than if they matched it perfectly……

Well I mean I know fuck all Russian but I’m asSUMING that’s a birth date anyways….

I’m weirdly weirded out…(or drunk. I may just be drunk…)

summary: Drabbles/Ficlets
title: Drabbles/Ficlets
body: I want to practice a bit and have fun while doing it so I’m letting you know I’m open to sending me pairs from my fandoms (you can check the ones that are more recent in the Currently watching section of my blog, the older ones are not catalogued but you can always ask!). If I can’t write for a pairing I’ll let you know and you can choose another one. (Ex: Ouat is genuinly a hit or miss situation with me so don’t presume – unless you know for a fact that I like/dislike a pairing) My intentions are 100-500 words per ficlet.

If I can’t write for a pairing I’ll let you know and you can choose another one. (Ex: Ouat is genuinly a hit or miss situation with me so don’t presume – unless you know for a fact that I like/dislike a pairing) My intentions are 100-500 words per ficlet.
trail.content: I want to practice a bit and have fun while doing it so I’m letting you know I’m open to sending me pairs from my fandoms (you can check the ones that are more recent in the Currently watching section of my blog, the older ones are not catalogued but you can always ask!). If I can’t write for a pairing I’ll let you know and you can choose another one. (Ex: Ouat is genuinly a hit or miss situation with me so don’t presume – unless you know for a fact that I like/dislike a pairing) My intentions are 100-500 words per ficlet.

blog.name: thegameofnerds
blog.title: The Game of Nerds
blog.description: Are you obsessed with a fandom, show, movie, or book?  Then you are at the right place!

summary: 'Killing Eve' and the Art of Surprise
title: 'Killing Eve' and the Art of Surprise
body:
#KillingEve is definitely worth checking out!

*Spoilers Ahead! For season 1 of  BBC America’s Killing Eve (2018)* 

Sandra Oh’s recent Golden Globe win for her portrayal of Eve Polastri on the hit BBC America drama Killing Eve encouraged many people who hadn’t got around to watching the show to check it out, and encouraged me to revisit this televisual masterpiece, this time with a keen critical eye for what really makes it so great.

Jodie…

View On WordPress
